column3: the service was TERRIBLE. We knew that the wait was going to be an hour or so
column4: and patiently ordered from the bar while we waited. They sat down several parties that arrived after us; we were a large group (6) and they were sitting parties of 2 people in booths that were supposed to be for 4 minimum. It looked very unorganized
column5: the way they handled the wait time and the sitting arrangement
column7: we were still not complaining at this time.
